title: Textile, 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print: grey-green bowl with large red, pink, lavender flowers with leaves in two shades of green. Bowl is placed on a "plaid" ground of deep pink, dark purple, and black. Condition: soiled. Black "J" stamped on selvage; color dots.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. 80.5 X 74. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-122.
